Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Pubang is a diversified group of companies integrating rare plant cultivation and research, organic agriculture promotion and demonstration, bio-organic fertiliser production, eco-agriculture sightseeing and tourism, tourism and real estate, professional planning of cultural activities, and landscaping projects.
